summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4509 for the improvement of Corwin Place, from Dearborn Street to Atlantic Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by construction of sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52905, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
